history.content: The following represents the data product specifications for customer360: {"data_product":{"name":"customer360","domain":"sales","owner":"john.doe@company.com","purpose":"Comprehensive customer data analysis for sales optimization","upstreams":["crm.salesforce","billing.stripe","web.events"],"interfaces":{"outputs":[{"output_name":"customer360_table","output_type":"table","sink_location":"data_warehouse.sales.customer360","freshness":"daily","fields":[{"name":"customer_id","type":"string","pk":true,"pii":false,"required":true,"description":"Unique customer identifier"},{"name":"email","type":"string","pk":false,"pii":true,"required":true,"description":"Customer email address"},{"name":"name","type":"string","pk":false,"pii":true,"required":false,"description":"Customer full name"},{"name":"total_purchases","type":"decimal","pk":false,"pii":false,"required":false,"description":"Total amount of purchases"},{"name":"last_purchase_date","type":"timestamp","pk":false,"pii":false,"required":false,"description":"Date of last purchase"},{"name":"created_at","type":"timestamp","pk":false,"pii":false,"required":true,"description":"Record creation timestamp"}]}]},"infrastructure":{"environment":"production","platform":"aws","deployment_type":"kubernetes","resources":{"compute":{"cpu":"2 cores","memory":"4GB RAM","storage":"100GB SSD"},"scaling":{"min_replicas":2,"max_replicas":10,"auto_scaling":true}},"networking":{"vpc":"vpc-sales-data","subnet":"subnet-private-1a","security_groups":["sg-data-processing","sg-database-access"]},"monitoring":{"logging":"cloudwatch","metrics":"prometheus","alerting":"pagerduty"}},"documentation":{"doc_type":"comprehensive","sections":["Technical Guide","User Guide","API Documentation","Data Dictionary","Runbook"],"format":"markdown","audience":["developers","data engineers","analysts","end users","operations team"],"artifacts":["README.md","technical-guide.md","user-guide.md","api-docs.md","data-dictionary.md","runbook.md"],"content_outline":{"technical_guide":{"title":"Customer360 Data Product - Technical Guide","sections":["Architecture Overview","Data Flow","Infrastructure Setup","Deployment Process","Configuration Management","Security Implementation","Performance Optimization"]},"user_guide":{"title":"Customer360 Data Product - User Guide","sections":["Getting Started","Data Access","Query Examples","Best Practices","Troubleshooting","Support Contacts"]},"api_documentation":{"title":"Customer360 Data Product - API Documentation","sections":["Authentication","Endpoints","Request/Response Formats","Rate Limits","Error Codes","Code Examples"]},"data_dictionary":{"title":"Customer360 Data Product - Data Dictionary","sections":["Field Definitions","Data Types","Business Rules","Data Quality Metrics","Change History"]},"runbook":{"title":"Customer360 Data Product - Operations Runbook","sections":["Deployment Procedures","Monitoring Setup","Alert Response","Troubleshooting Steps","Recovery Procedures","Maintenance Tasks"]}}}}
Schema contract captured. Data product schema and SLA requirements are defined.
